Bay County Car enthusiasts welcome back annual Emerald Coast Cruizin Car Show by: Courtney Fegley Posted: Nov 7, 2024 / 04:45 PM CST Updated: Nov 7, 2024 / 10:23 PM CST by: Courtney Fegley Posted: Nov 7, 2024 / 04:45 PM CST Updated: Nov 7, 2024 / 10:23 PM CST SHARE PANAMA CITY BEACH, Fla. ( WMBB ) — Car lovers from across the nation brought their hot rides to Panama City Beach for the annual fall Emerald Coast Cruizin Car Show. From antique Cadillacs to souped-up Lamborghinis, each vehicle is sure to impress. Gulf County Correctional Institution plans on re-opening it’s sister unit “We’ve got tons of classic cars, new cars, any kind of car you want. We’ve got anything from a Lamborghini to a Volkswagen, lots of vendors, food vendors, car vendors,” event organizer Terry Poore said. Event organizers say the car show is one of the best in the south. Its wide variety of cars keeps enthusiasts coming back for more. “You’ve got Fords, you’ve got Chevrolets, you’ve got everything that you can imagine out here. They just like to see what people are bringing. Behind us, we’ve got an Auburn and a Ford Coupe Saturn right here behind us,” Poore said. Event attendees say it’s fascinating to see the hard work and detail each car owner puts into their vehicles. “I like to go around and see the cars and see the uniqueness of them. A lot of people put a lot of time and detail into things that people don’t recognize. They see a paint job and fancy tires and that’s it. But if you look, there’s a lot of hours in probably each and every one of these cars out here being built,” event attendee Rick Sasser said. And they’re excited to see what the rest of this week’s car show brings. 33 bags of cocaine and $4K found following traffic stop in Calhoun County “I like the entertainment and just milling around, looking at cars, and talking to people,” event attendee Vonnie Kirker said. TV personality Cristy Lee and syndicated radio talk show host Sam Memmolo will be holding meet-and-greets this weekend and signing autographs. Single-day admission is $20, a 3-day pass is $50. Exclusive Sunset, Dolphin and Beach Experiences Exclusive Sunset, Dolphin and Beach Experiences Exclusive Sunset, Dolphin and Beach Experiences Exclusive Sunset, Dolphin and Beach Experiences Book Now About Us Welcome to one of the best kept secrets in the Panama City area! Book your exclusive sunset tour, private dolphin excursion or experience a perfect day at Shell Island along the Emerald Coast of Florida. Our beautiful Grady-White offers a smooth and stable ride and the customizable trip allows you and your guests to maximize their time on the water, like a real islander! Let’s go fishing, snorkeling, shell hunting, sightseeing and experience the local sea life! We can see dolphins, sting rays and manatees to name a few! Want to experience a fun trip to the famous Crab Island sandbar in Destin, FL. Enjoy a beautiful ride across the sparkling Gulf waters on your way to Crab Island where you’ll enjoy swimming and fun activities in this on-the-water hotspot as you soak up the tropical sun! Wanting something truly unique, let’s run the intercoastal down the “Forgotten Coast” and experience old Apalachicola where the seafood industry started over 175 years ago and is thriving today with renowned locally caught seafood. Grab lunch and hit the shops for a once in a lifetime experience! The combinations are endless! Come experience, Panama City Beach, Destin, Apalachicola, and all destinations between! Rates Contact us for a free quote to your once-in-a-lifetime experience! Photo Gallery Contact Us Send us a message with any comments, questions, or scheduling concerns. We will get back to you soon! You can still come stroll the event with access to thousands of Show Cars and Trucks on display, plus enjoy our Vendor Market Midway and Concerts. Admission Only Tickets can be purchased at the Event Spectator Gate for $20 per day (children under 12 are free). Click to Buy Your Tickets Main Event Location Aaron Bessant Park is located at 500 W Park Dr, Panama City Beach, FL 32413. We are just across from Pier Park, just one block away from the beach! This event is positioned on 17 acres of luscious green grass, with side walks, shade trees, park benches, and clean air conditioned restrooms. Emerald Coast Cruizin’ features a center stage to host live music and show awards. Ladies, Pier Park offers over 125 stores for fabulous shopping right next door! You will not want to miss this event! Make plans now for Emerald Coast Cruizin’! Secure offsite trailer parking, please contact Bill Nieland at (360) 789-1260 or billnieland1@gmail.com to register your trailer for the entire event. All money raised from this parking lot is being donated to the Optimist Club benefiting childhood cancer research.
